fields.description: Unique ID for the course.

Indicates whether the course is inactive.
Unique title for the course.

Alphanumeric number for the course.

Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.
Indicates whether the course requires enrollment. Only required for digital courses.
Minimum number of enrollments allowed for the course.
Maximum number of enrollments allowed for the course. Required to enable users to enroll.
The number of spaces on the waitlist. Specify a number greater than zero to configure a waitlist for the blended course.
Indicates whether the course has unlimited capacity.
The date the course expires. Thats is, the date a learner is certified until after successfully completing the course.
Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.
Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.
The duration unit value. A three digit numeric value.

The recurrence frequency start date. This is the initial expiration date that the recurring expiry will be based on. Example: You specify a Recurrence Start Date of 2021-01-01. This is the initial expiration date and the recurrence cycle will start from this date.
The recurrence frequency unit value. A three digit numeric value.
Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.
Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.
The Retrain Window unit value. A three digit numeric value.
Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.
Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.
Contains an advanced expiration rule that will apply a custom expiration date/duration to specific learning enrollment
Contains data for Other Unit Type values for the course.
The alphanumeric reference ID value of a sales item for the learning course. Use the Get_Sales_Items web service to find the sales item and its reference ID.
The alphanumeric reference ID value of a competency for the learning course. Use the Get_Competencies web service to find the competency and its reference ID.
Upon activation, users who view this course  / offering will now see any configured pricing. On deactivation, users who view this course / offering will no longer see any configured pricing.
Price in Training Credits for this Learning Content.
Advanced Pricing Rule Data used to set pricing rules for both workers and extended enterprise learners
References Skills related to a Digital Course from Skills Cloud
References the contact persons for the course.
Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.
Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.
Numeric time duration for the time value reference for the course.
Indicates whether to automatically enroll learners from the waitlist when space in a course offering becomes available. Ensure that you also set the Waitlist Capacity field.
Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.
Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.
Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.
Text attribute identifying a unique ID for Attachment.
Text attribute that identifies the filename of the attachment.
Text attribute identifying Content Type of the Attachment.
File content in binary format.
Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.
Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.
Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.
Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.
Indicates if the course is a legacy course.
References the active learning instructors who can teach the lesson.
Allowed Assessors
References the active business site locations where you can schedule the lesson.
Indicates whether to exclude the course from learning recommendations.
If true, hide learning content from search results.
Indicates whether Disable Express Interest is activated on the learning content.
Contains information about the lessons on the course.
The full launch URL for the course. This is a universal URL which will deeplink to the native Workday application on mobile devices.
The average rating of the learning content by learners who complete the content. A number between 0 and five.
The number of learners who rated the content.

Advanced_Expiration_Rules.description: Contains an advanced expiration rule that will apply a custom expiration date/duration to specific learning enrollment

Advanced_Pricing_Rules.description: Advanced Pricing Rule Data used to set pricing rules for both workers and extended enterprise learners

Allowed_Instructor_Reference.description: References the active learning instructors who can teach the lesson.

Allowed_Location_Reference.description: References the active business site locations where you can schedule the lesson.

Average_Rating.description: The average rating of the learning content by learners who complete the content. A number between 0 and five.

Competency_Reference.description: The alphanumeric reference ID value of a competency for the learning course. Use the Get_Competencies web service to find the competency and its reference ID.

Contact_Person_Reference.description: References the contact persons for the course.

Content_Type.description: Text attribute identifying Content Type of the Attachment.

Course_Lesson_Data.description: Contains information about the lessons on the course.

Current_Expiration_Date.description: The recurrence frequency start date. This is the initial expiration date that the recurring expiry will be based on. Example: You specify a Recurrence Start Date of 2021-01-01. This is the initial expiration date and the recurrence cycle will start from this date.

Disable_Express_Interest.description: Indicates whether Disable Express Interest is activated on the learning content.

Effective_Date.description: Date the course version takes effect.

Enable_Auto_Enrollment_from_Waitlist.description: Indicates whether to automatically enroll learners from the waitlist when space in a course offering becomes available. Ensure that you also set the Waitlist Capacity field.

Exclude_from_Recommendations.description: Indicates whether to exclude the course from learning recommendations.

Exclude_from_Search_and_Browse.description: If true, hide learning content from search results.

Expiration_Date.description: The date the course expires. Thats is, the date a learner is certified until after successfully completing the course.

File_Name.description: Text attribute that identifies the filename of the attachment.

Format_Reference_Learning_Time_Unit_ID.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

Format_Reference_WID.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

Image_ID.description: Text attribute identifying a unique ID for Attachment.

Inactive.description: Indicates whether the course is inactive.

Language_Reference.description: References the languages for the content.

Launch_URL.description: The full launch URL for the course. This is a universal URL which will deeplink to the native Workday application on mobile devices.

Learning_Image_Reference_File_ID.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

Learning_Image_Reference_Image_ID.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

Learning_Image_Reference_WID.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

Learning_Other_Unit_Type_Data.description: Contains data for Other Unit Type values for the course.

Legacy_Course.description: Indicates if the course is a legacy course.

Maximum_Enrollment_Capacity.description: Maximum number of enrollments allowed for the course. Required to enable users to enroll.

Minimum_Enrollment_Capacity.description: Minimum number of enrollments allowed for the course.

On_Demand.description: Indicates whether the course requires enrollment. Only required for digital courses.

Price_in_Training_Credits.description: Price in Training Credits for this Learning Content.

Pricing_Enabled.description: Upon activation, users who view this course  / offering will now see any configured pricing. On deactivation, users who view this course / offering will no longer see any configured pricing.

Rating_Count.description: The number of learners who rated the content.

Recurrence_Format_Reference_Learning_Tim.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

Recurrence_Format_Reference_WID.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

Recurrence_Format_Value.description: The recurrence frequency unit value. A three digit numeric value.

Registrable_Status_Reference_Learning_Re.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

Registrable_Status_Reference_WID.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

Retrain_Window_Format_Reference_Learning.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

Retrain_Window_Format_Reference_WID.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

Retrain_Window_Unit_Value.description: The Retrain Window unit value. A three digit numeric value.

Sales_Item_Reference.description: The alphanumeric reference ID value of a sales item for the learning course. Use the Get_Sales_Items web service to find the sales item and its reference ID.

Security_Category_Reference.description: References the Security Categories this course is to be included in.

Skill_Level_Reference_Learning_Skill_Lev.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

Skill_Level_Reference_WID.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

Skill_Reference.description: References Skills related to a Digital Course from Skills Cloud

Time_Value_Reference_Learning_Time_Unit_.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

Time_Value_Reference_WID.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

Topic_Reference.description: References the topics for the course.

Total_Course_Duration.description: Numeric time duration for the time value reference for the course.

Unlimited_Capacity.description: Indicates whether the course has unlimited capacity.

Value.description: The duration unit value. A three digit numeric value.

Version_Label.description: Alphanumeric version label for the course.

Waitlist_Capacity.description: The number of spaces on the waitlist. Specify a number greater than zero to configure a waitlist for the blended course.

Workdrive_Document_Content_Reference_Fil.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

Workdrive_Document_Content_Reference_Mig.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

Workdrive_Document_Content_Reference_WID.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

Workdrive_Document_Content_Reference_Wor.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.
